name: Wetline: Turku
description:
Take the wheel of an out of control aerial racing car! Collect the power pellets to stay in the air. Beware, as you collect more fuel strange things will happen.

Controls:

  • Arrow up - accelerate
  • Arrows Left and Right - up and down
  • Arrow Down - invert turning

Post your High Score / "Matka" below!

Made for GMTK Game Jam2020
